paper_abstract: We present the Fortran code SusyBSG version 1.1, which computes the branching ratio for the decay B -> X-s gamma in the MSSM with Minimal Flavor Violation. The Computation takes into account all the available NLO contributions, including the complete supersymmetric QCD corrections to the Wilson coefficients of the magnetic and chromomagnetic operators.
paper_title: SusyBSG: a Fortran code for BR[B -> X-s gamma] in the MSSM with Minimal Flavor Violation
